casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Eric Lamontee BECK, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 152934
COA: 321806 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to file a sur-reply is GRANTED. The sur-reply will be accepted for filing if submitted on or before October 11, 2018.
